title: Answering
content:
Answering an incoming call when the screen is white and the caller's name is at the top, no problem.
Answering an incoming call when the screen shows three tabs at the top... that's a problem.  I have tried taping, pressing hard, and pressing lightly.  The answer button will not connect the call.  After my try and before the caller doesn't connect, the screen changes and I have no way to answer the incoming call.  Is there a way to delete this feature?  If not, what can I do?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
